title: Target’s "Cute" New $5 Holiday Pillows Are So Nostalgic, You'll Want One of Each
description: They're the perfect cuddly material, too. READ MORE...
author: Olivia Harvey
excerpt: They're the perfect cuddly material, too.
text: Kitchen & HomeTableware & DecorProduct Reviews & RecommendationsWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: JHVEPhoto / ShutterstockIt’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas at Target! Now that spooky season has wrapped up, it seems like everyone has entered into the world of all things holly and jolly — and right now you can score an adorable gingerbread-themed pillow at Target for just $5.Available in Target’s Bullseye’s Playground section, this textured pillow comes in the shape of a gingerbread house and features a red bow, a smooth tiled roof, and a heart-shaped door. The house itself is made from a cuddly terry fabric that looks as cozy as it feels.“Cute pillow,” one Target shopper wrote in their review. “It reminds me of teddy bear material! Perfect size and shape.”To go along with the gingerbread house, you can pick up gingerbread people, too! This little guy is also just $5 and made with the same fuzzy fabric. “I can’t believe this pillow is only $5,” one Target shopper wrote. “It’s literally so cute and amazing quality!!”Because these pillows are in Bullseye’s Playground, they’re currently in-store exclusive pieces. But if you’re willing to pay a bit more, you can have Target’s $10 Wondershop gingerbread pillow shipped right to your house. It also has nearly perfect reviews. One person wrote, “I immediately searched for this pillow as soon as I saw it online; my toddler will love this!” And someone else added, “My bestie had this at her house and omg it’s so cute and soft!!!”
html:
• Kitchen & Home
  • Tableware & Decor
  • Product Reviews & Recommendations

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

It’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas at Target! Now that spooky season has wrapped up, it seems like everyone has entered into the world of all things holly and jolly — and right now you can score an adorable gingerbread-themed pillow at Target for just $5.

Available in Target’s Bullseye’s Playground section, this textured pillow comes in the shape of a gingerbread house and features a red bow, a smooth tiled roof, and a heart-shaped door. The house itself is made from a cuddly terry fabric that looks as cozy as it feels.

“Cute pillow,” one Target shopper wrote in their review. “It reminds me of teddy bear material! Perfect size and shape.”

To go along with the gingerbread house, you can pick up gingerbread people, too! This little guy is also just $5 and made with the same fuzzy fabric. “I can’t believe this pillow is only $5,” one Target shopper wrote. “It’s literally so cute and amazing quality!!”

Because these pillows are in Bullseye’s Playground, they’re currently in-store exclusive pieces. But if you’re willing to pay a bit more, you can have Target’s $10 Wondershop gingerbread pillow shipped right to your house. It also has nearly perfect reviews. One person wrote, “I immediately searched for this pillow as soon as I saw it online; my toddler will love this!” And someone else added, “My bestie had this at her house and omg it’s so cute and soft!!!”
